alert.note: Alert for Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 5:15PM MDT until August 04 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Todd County in south central South Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 615 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Parmelee to 4 miles south of Spring Creek, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Grass Mountain around 625 PM CDT. Saint Francis and Soldier Creek around 630 PM CDT. Two Strike around 635 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Rosebud, Ring Thunder, Fairgrounds Housing, Lakeview, Mission, Antelope and Haystack Butte. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
